protocol.text: Raw data were processed using Affymetrix Gene Chip Operating Software (GCOS; Version 1.4.0.036). ID_REF =  VALUE = Signal ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M) DETECTION P-VALUE =
At 2 weeks of age, cotyledons were collected as samples.

Arabidopsis wild-type, KO-nudx6, KO-nudx7, and double KO-nudx6/7 plants were grown on MS medium in a growth chamber kept at 23°C during 16 h of light (100 µmol/m2/s) and at 22°C during 8 h of darkness.

Total RNA was semi-automatically purified from various organs of Arabidopsis plants using a QuickGene RNA cultured cell Kit and QuickGene-Mini80 (FUJIFILM corporation, Tokyo, Japan). The quality and purity of the RNA were confirmed for microarray analysis with an Ultrospec 2100 pro (GE Healthcare UK Ltd, Amersham Place, England).

Total RNA samples were reverse-transcribed, yielding double-strand cDNA, which was transcribed in vitro in the presence of biotin-labeled nucleotides with an IVT Labeling Kit (Affymetrix Inc., Santa Clara, CA), and purified.
Labeled cRNA was fragmented and hybridized to Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChip arrays for 16 h at 45°C according to Affymetrix protocols.
Arrays were washed on an Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450 and measured for fluorescence intensity with an Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000.
